select p.id id, p.brand_id , p.brand_name , p.product_category_id category_id, p.product_category_name category_name, p.pic pic, p.name name, p.sub_title sub_title, p.price price, p.sale sale, p.new_status , p.recommand_status , p.promotion_type p.stock stock, p.keywords keywords, p.sort sort, pav.id attribute_id, pav.value attribute_attr_value, pav.product_attribute_id attribute_attr_id, pa.type attribute_attr_type, pa.name attribute_attr_name from tl_mall_goods.pms_product p left join tl_mall_goods.pms_product_attribute_value pav on p.id = pav.product_id left join tl_mall_goods.pms_product_attribute pa on pav.product_attribute_id= pa.id where delete_status = 0 and publish_status = 1
and p.id=#{id}

SELECT product.id as id, product.name as name, product.keywords, product.new_status, product.pic pic, product.sub_title sub_title, product.price, product.promotion_price as promotion_price, product.original_price, product.sale, product.stock, brand.id as brand_id, brand.name as brand_name, brand.logo as brand_img, product.product_category_id as category_id, category.name as category_name, brand.big_pic as brand_big_pic, attribute.id as attribute_attr_id, attribute.name as attribute_attr_name, attribute.type as attribute_attr_type, attr_value.value as attribute_attr_value, attr_value.id as attribute_id FROM tl_mall_goods.pms_product product join pms_brand brand on product.brand_id = brand.id join pms_product_category category on product.product_category_id = category.id left join pms_product_attribute_value attr_value on product.id = attr_value.product_id left join pms_product_attribute attribute on attribute.id = attr_value.product_attribute_id left join pms_product_attribute_category attribute_category on attribute_category.id = attribute.product_attribute_category_id where delete_status = 0 and publish_status = 1
